long_description: Ready for time trials and fast group rides, the Cannondale CAAD10 5 Compact road bike offers Shimano 105 components and a high-performance aluminum frame tweaked to race-ready perfection. 6069 aluminum CAAD10 frame offers responsive stiffness with impressive weight savings that rivals some carbon frames. Butted and shaped seatstays and chainstays help reduce side-to-side flex for energy efficiency while also helping make bumps and road vibrations less jarring. Lightweight all-carbon fork supplies great road performance, slicing through corners and damping road vibrations; tapered steerer enhances stiffness and responsiveness. Sturdy Shimano 105 derailleurs and shifters offer precise, dependable shifts throughout the 20 gear combinations. Compact FSA Gossamer Pro crankset is paired with a 12 - 27 tooth cassette for a highly capable gear range, letting you spin comfortably no matter the gradient. BB30 bottom bracket design improves stiffness and increases power efficiency at a critical point on the bike. Shimano RS-11 wheelset is decked out with fast Schwalbe Lugano folding tires for excellent handling and speed. Please note: pedals are sold separately. Cannondale CAAD10 5 Compact road bike specs are subject to change.
short_description: Ready for time trials and fast group rides, the Cannondale CAAD10 5 Compact road bike offers Shimano 105 components and a high-performance aluminum frame tweaked to race-ready perfection.
